Package cse3063f19p1_abinay_myayin_aaltay.game.config

Class BaseConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • cse3063f19p1_abinay_myayin_aaltay.game.config.BaseConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MonopolyConfig
    public abstract class BaseConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    BaseConfig is the abstract base class for GSON Library. Holds base attributes and functionality for generating,reading and writing config files.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.lang.String path
      Path of the config file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BaseConfig​(java.lang.String path)
      Constructs a base JSON config representation

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void generate()
      Generates an empty JSON file on the filesystem path pointed by path
      BaseConfig readConfig()
      Reads the file from path and deserializes a config object from it
      abstract void resetConfig()
      Resets the config object into its initial state.
      void writeConfig()
      Serializes the JSON config representation and writes it on the filesystem location pointed by path

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • path

        protected java.lang.String path
        Path of the config file. Used by readConfig() for IO JSON deserialization purposes. Set by the constructor (BaseConfig(String))

      • readConfig

        public BaseConfig readConfig()
        Reads the file from path and deserializes a config object from it
        Returns:
        Deserialized config object

      • generate

        public void generate()
        Generates an empty JSON file on the filesystem path pointed by path

      • resetConfig

        public abstract void resetConfig()
        Resets the config object into its initial state. Used when the config file is absent and being re-created.

      • writeConfig

        public void writeConfig()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes the JSON config representation and writes it on the filesystem location pointed by path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an unexpected IO problem occurs
